Security & Compliance

Resilience & Backup

Business continuity and disaster recovery with automated backup, replication, and rapid recovery capabilities.

Solution Overview

Verto Wave's Resilience & Backup solution ensures your business can withstand and quickly recover from disruptions, whether they are caused by cyberattacks, natural disasters, or human error. In today's always-on digital world, downtime is not an option. Our solution provides a comprehensive approach to business continuity and disaster recovery, from developing your recovery strategy to implementing and testing your recovery plans. We help you protect your critical data and applications, minimize downtime, and ensure that your business can continue to operate in the face of adversity. With our Resilience & Backup solution, you can build a more resilient organization, protect your brand reputation, and maintain customer trust.

Key Features

Feature

Description

Disaster Recovery as a Service (DRaaS)

Replicate your critical workloads to a secure cloud environment, enabling rapid recovery in the event of a disaster.

Backup and Recovery

Protect your data with our enterprise-grade backup and recovery solutions, ensuring that you can recover your data quickly and reliably.

Business Continuity Management (BCM)

Develop and maintain a comprehensive business continuity plan to ensure that your business can continue to operate during a disruption.

Quantified Benefits

Reduce Recovery Time Objective (RTO) by up to 90%

Our DRaaS and rapid recovery solutions enable you to recover your critical systems and data in minutes, not hours or days.

Reduce Recovery Point Objective (RPO) to near-zero

Continuous data protection and replication ensure that you lose minimal data in the event of a disruption.

Reduce the Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) for Disaster Recovery by up to 50%

Our cloud-based solutions eliminate the need for expensive secondary data centers and infrastructure.

Ensure Compliance with Regulatory Requirements

Our solution helps you meet industry regulations and standards for data protection and disaster recovery.

Integration with Verto Wave Portfolio

Security Governance

Integration with our Security Governance solution ensures that your resilience and backup strategies are aligned with your overall risk management framework.

Configuration Management

By integrating with our Configuration Management solution, you can ensure that your recovery environment is consistent with your production environment.

Systems Management

Our Resilience & Backup solution provides the data needed to power our Systems Management solutions, giving you a complete view of your IT infrastructure's health and recoverability.

Cloud Migration & Optimization

We help you protect your cloud workloads with our cloud-native backup and disaster recovery solutions.
